pdp.title: Penn Degree Plan
pdp.subtitle: Goodbye spreadsheets, hello PDP.
pdp.blurb: Penn Degree Plan is a student-run service that provides 4-year degree planning for undergraduate courses and professors at the University of Pennsylvania. Personally, I've worked on a transcript parser to auto-load courses, and I've also researched and implemented double counting across multiple majors/degrees (while considering the many, many edge cases that are involved).

content.title: Try it out! (You need to be a Penn student)

infer.title: Infer!
infer.subtitle: Training inference skills with ease.
infer.blurb:
Infer! offers an engaging way to train one's inference skills - by watching movies! After pivotal scenes, the app prompts the user with a series of customized questions tailored to testing one's inference abilities.
I created this app for someone I know who has autism - she found her previous inference training boring (simply consisting of repeated flashcards), so I worked with her to make her favorite pasttime - watching movies - into something she could also learn from!

awards.title: THIRD PLACE
awards.description: 3rd place winner of the Congressional App Challenge

nutrivision.title: Nutrivision
nutrivision.subtitle: Breaking the dieting barrier with innovation.
nutrivision.blurb: Nutrivision encourages healthy eating without the usual severe dieting pressure. Easing the process by crunching all the numbers in the background, Nutrivision analyzes user-submitted photos of food and offers only gentle suggestions and a single graph - in or out of your zone.

awards.title: BEST THEME
awards.description: Winner of Best Theme Award of San Mateo Hacks 2024

memory.title: Memory Research
memory.subtitle: How do we make memory training engaging?
memory.blurb: Gamified the dual n-back task, a cognitive exercise that improves working memory, to target the dopaminergic system and enhance user engagement. Conducted numerous studies to gauge effectiveness of novel n-back game. Work performed in the Jahanikia NeuroLab.

info.title: TOPICS
info.content: Working Memory, N-Back Task, Game Design

conferences.title: ORAL TALK
conferences.description: Southern California Conferences for Undergraduate Research, 2023

llmcreativity.title: LLM Creativity Research
llmcreativity.subtitle: How creative is AI?
llmcreativity.blurb: Evaluated human creativity in comparison to AI creativity by adapting existing creativity assessments and inventories (AUT, RAT, TTCT Figural, and NEO-FFI). Proposed perspective with which to view AI in regards to creative endeaors and designing platform to bolster human creativity. Led team in the Jahanikia NeuroLab.

info.title: TOPICS
info.content: AI, Convergent Thinking, Divergent Thinking, RAT, AUT, TTCT

serviceoutreach.title: Service Outreach Club
serviceoutreach.subtitle: Giving back. A lot.
serviceoutreach.blurb: Co-led my school's Service Outreach Club. Prepared and led weekly club meetings to engage members in numerous volunteer activities, both on and off campus. Club became so widespread that quite literally half the school joined.

bingo.title: SkyBlock Bingo Guide
bingo.subtitle: A guide to gameception.
bingo.blurb: Completed as my CS50x final project. An automated guide for a Hypixel SkyBlock's Bingo, a super niche game in a game in a game in a game. The website fetches data from Hypixel's public API, seeks out significant keywords or phrases, and generates a solution to a Bingo task or webscrapes relevant information.
